content.title: Involvement
content.subtitle: & inspiration
content.text: With over 10 years of experience in the events industry, I am ready to bring your unforgettable day to life. Whether it's the wedding of your dreams, a spectacular corporate event, or a unique cultural project, I ensure that every detail is executed perfectly.
content.subtext: As a dedicated freelancer in the events industry, my passion lies in designing, creating, and organizing extraordinary events. My goal is not only to captivate but to leave a lasting impression on all participants. Every event I organize is unique and memorable, with a focus on creating experiences that resonate deeply and are remembered long after they end.
content.quote: On the day itself, I am your point of contact, the leader behind the scenes, and the person who ensures that every link in the process runs smoothly.
content.subquote: while at the same time providing unique and memorable experiences.

about.title: My name is
about.name: Ylenia Guerrini
about.titleText: een ervaren internationale organisator met meer dan 10 jaar ervaring in de evenementen- en productiewereld, weet ik precies wat er nodig is om een evenement of productie tot in de kleinste details te laten slagen. Of het nu gaat om het organiseren van een grootschalig evenement of het beheren van een kleinschalige productie, ik zorg ervoor dat alles vlekkeloos verloopt.
